meanings.sent1: The room was lit darkliest by the single candle on the table.
meanings.sent2: She walked slowly and darkliest through the haunted house.
meanings.sent3: The cat stealthily crept darkliest through the shadows, trying to catch the mouse.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds gathered darkliest over the horizon, signaling the coming rain.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night was darkliest, with only the faint moonlight filtering through the trees.

meanings.definition: To the greatest degree of darkness
meanings.sent1: The night darkliest enveloped the city, casting everything in shadow.
meanings.sent2: As the sun set, the room darkliest until it was completely black.
meanings.sent3: The cave darkliest as the explorers ventured deeper into its depths.
meanings.sent4: His mood darkliest as he brooded over the bad news he had received.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds darkliest the sky, blocking out all sunlight.
